markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Woodcraft](/Feats.aspx?ID=979) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a innate familiarity with forested areas. When in a forest or jungle environment, if you roll a critical failure on a [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) skill check to Sense Direction, Subsist, or Cover Tracks, you get a failure instead, and if you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
name: Woodcraft
